body.data:
SELECT 
    p.numped,
    s.SAIDAID,
    s.CODMOTORISTA,
    e.NOME,
    p.codfilial,
    f.RAZAOSOCIAL,
    gf.SIGLA
FROM pcpedc p
JOIN TAB_SAIDAMOTO s ON p.numped = s.NUMPED
JOIN PCEMPR e ON s.CODMOTORISTA = e.MATRICULA
JOIN pcfilial f ON p.codfilial = f.CODIGO
JOIN TAB_GRUPOFILIAL gf ON gf.CODFILIAL = f.CODIGO
WHERE TRUNC(s.DATASAIDA) = TRUNC(SYSDATE);
